name: Conquest of Tarot
description:
In the card game Conquest of Tarot you play a daring squire who must go on an adventure to become a knight. On his way he has to face various opponents with the help of his magic tarot cards. Will you manage to defeat the bosses and become a knight? The game is played with attack, healing and defense cards.

Attack cards deal damage when they are played

healing cards heal all allied cards

defence cards have a chance to avoid damage

W to Move

Left Click to play cards

X to skip fights ( may break things :D)

Made by : Git Nightmare/Wish Woosh

Blagovest - Coding

David - Sounds + Ui

Luan - 3D Assets

Chaos - Pixelart/Cards

Julia - Startscreen/ Endscreen

Berdan - a little bit of everything
